Name: Instinct War - Card Game
About the game: FEATURES Variety of Cards 50 fully hand-drawn cards Combat System: Choosing a path from 3 cards at every turn, one bad decision can lead you to the death. Collect items that will help you get by just one more step in this Instinct War. The Roguelike Way: Every run it's unique! You will need to make decisions at every step of the way. Use your items in a smart way or your character's abilities. Beware of the strong enemies, they can take you down easily. Shop When you finish a run, you can buy a varied of items to make your character stronger. Just One More Turn: Instinct War provides you with a varied play style that makes you wanna go further and further. How long can you last in this war?
